title: TzHaar-Mej (monster)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The TzHaar-Mej are both the leaders of the TzHaar people and powerful mages. They fight with both melee and magic using their staves. When attacked within 6 squares of other higher level TzHaar (Ket and Xil), the mage will cry out "Kot kl, zek e JalYt!" which roughly translates to "Save me, attack the human!" This will cause the nearby TzHaar to aid the TzHaar-Mej in combat.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:TzHaar-Mej
This article is about the monster. For the NPC for the Karamja Diary, see TzHaar-Mej.

The TzHaar-Mej are both the leaders of the TzHaar people and powerful mages. They fight with both melee and magic using their staves. When attacked within 6 squares of other higher level TzHaar (Ket and Xil), the mage will cry out "Kot kl, zek e JalYt!" which roughly translates to "Save me, attack the human!" This will cause the nearby TzHaar to aid the TzHaar-Mej in combat.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Unlike other TzHaar monsters, the drop rate of TzHaar-Mej dropping obsidian equipment is significantly lower than the rate of other TzHaar dropping obsidian equipment, being 1/4,096 whilst the other TzHaar drop equipment at a rate of 1/512.
